verses.name: Romans 11:25
verses.text: For I would not, brethren, that ye should be ignorant of this mystery, lest ye should be wise in your own conceits; that blindness in part is happened to Israel, until the fulness of the Gentiles be come in.

verses.name: Romans 11:26
verses.text: And so all Israel shall be saved: as it is written, There shall come out of Sion the Deliverer, and shall turn away ungodliness from Jacob:

verses.name: Romans 11:27
verses.text: For this is my covenant unto them, when I shall take away their sins.
